casebody.data:
Chamberlain
v.
N.C. Department of Public Safety, et al 241P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Robert S. Chamberlain, For Chamberlain, Robert Samuel. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2016 by Petitioner for Petition to Seek a Court Order to Remove Locking Devices/Latches and Chains from Cell Doors: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016." Ervin, J. recused
